question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. tree
B. grey car
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The grey car is positioned further down the street and behind the red bus, while the tree is in the foreground with visible branches and leaves close to the camera, making the depth relationship very obvious.
